Articles.Content:
Am I missing something? Whats up with the IVA in the MK2 cockpit, there's no windows...

I did some searching and didn't see anything on this, sorry if this is a repost.

Edit: Is there any way to mod the MK1 cockpit onto the MK2 in cfg files?

Edited September 24, 2012 by SLAMS
It's not done yet. Same with the 3 person cockpit.
I think there are two separate mods where someone made an IVA for them.

Replying to a 2-year old thread to say "I think there's a mod for that"?

The Mk2 cockpit they're talking about isn't even the Mk2 cockpit we have now.

Lock it sal_vager, lock it.
I didn't even notice this was from 2012. lol
Hey, at least Sal gave us a link to the mod. That was kinda harsh, Pecan...
Thread is still relevant sadly. Are these likely to appear in 0.26?

I hope the internals for the 2 cockpits and the lab module haven't been forgotten =[

Also some missing instrumentation in the 2-man lander can.

I hope the internals for the 2 cockpits and the lab module haven't been forgotten =[

Also some missing instrumentation in the 2-man lander can.

Oh yeah, in December it will be a full year of waiting for a lab IVA.
I think that mod still works on the (now renamed) MK1 Inline.

Add more IVAs to the list of things I'd like to see in 0.26.

The one in the link is a good substitute though.

The way I see it, there are now 4 main things that need IVAs:

1: Mk. 1 inline cockpit

2: ScienceLab

3: Mk. 3 cockpit (possibly coming with new mk. 3 parts)

4: Mk. 2 4-kerbal carrier module

I've seen the first 3 talked about, but no one's mention the 4th item yet. I'd love to see an IVA in there.
